ai.summary: The Mayflower Trail is a short, easy 4.6 km hike in the United Kingdom. It suits beginners and families, with gentle terrain, minimal ascent, and well-marked paths through rural countryside.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly gentle terrain with well-marked footpaths. Expect grassy fields, dirt tracks, and occasional gravel. Some gates or stiles and potential mud after rain; boots with good grip recommended.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before you go; UK conditions can change quickly. Wear sturdy footwear and bring waterproof layers. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of livestock on rural sections, and carry a small first aid kit, water, and a mobile phone with emergency numbers. The distance is short, but daylight hours vary by season.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation / charged phone
ai.best_seasons: March to October, with spring and autumn offering mild weather and pleasant scenery; expect mud and rain outside these months.

seo.title: Mayflower Trail - Easy 4.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Mayflower Trail, an easy 4.6 km hike in the United Kingdom. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and what to bring for a pleasant day outdoors.
